data.title: Platinum Equity Llc Net Worth (2024)
data.meta_description: Platinum Equity Llc Net Worth 2024 and insider trades, trade reports, independent equity research, and stock screening.
data.text:
Platinum Equity Llc currently owns a total of 2 stocks. Among these stocks, Platinum Equity Llc owns 3,540,344 shares of Verra Mobility Corp (VRRM) as of December 10, 2021, with a value of $97 Million and a weighting of 56.54%. Platinum Equity Llc also owns 3,924,478 shares of Ryerson Holding Corp (RYI) as of August 8, 2023, with a value of $75 Million and a weighting of 43.46%.

According to the SEC Form 4 filings, Platinum Equity Llc has made a total of 8 transactions in Verra Mobility Corp (VRRM) over the past 5 years, including 0 buys and 8 sells. The most-recent trade in Verra Mobility Corp is the sale of 8,207,821 shares on December 10, 2021, which brought Platinum Equity Llc around $121 Million.

According to the SEC Form 4 filings, Platinum Equity Llc has made a total of 4 transactions in Ryerson Holding Corp (RYI) over the past 5 years, including 0 buys and 4 sells. The most-recent trade in Ryerson Holding Corp is the sale of 4,000,000 shares on August 8, 2023, which brought Platinum Equity Llc around $121 Million.
